sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { Grid, Image } from "semantic-ui-react";
import "../../styles/Dashboard.css";
//charts import
import ChangableStatistic from "./charts/ChangableStatistic";
import UnchangeableStatiscitc from "./charts/UnchangableStatistic";
import TimeSerie from "./charts/TimeSerie";
import DoughnutChart from "./charts/Doughnut";
import BarChart from "./charts/BarChart";
import PolarChart from "./charts/PolarChart";
import List from './charts/List';

const Section = () => (
  <Grid divided className="section" stackable columns="equal">
    {/* First Row contain all the charts */}
    <Grid.Row>
      <Grid.Column width={4}>
        <ChangableStatistic
          name="star"
          color="green"
          degreeOfChange={100}
          text="Cookie Sold"
          label="today"
        />
        <ChangableStatistic
          name="thumbs down"
          color="red"
          degreeOfChange={1.05}
          text="Cookie Wasted"
          label="today"
        />
        <UnchangeableStatiscitc
          name="pointing right"
          color="green"
          text="Daily Estimated Profit"
          label="$"
          number="5600"
        />
        <UnchangeableStatiscitc
          name="pointing right"
          color="red"
          text="Daily Estimated Cost"
          label="$"
          number="1470"
        />
        <List green text="Best seller cookie" data={["1st Mommy Chocolate Chip", "2nd Cherry Blossom Sweeet Pie", "3rd 3-stacks-vanilla Pie"]} />
        <List green={false} text="Worst seller cookie" data={["1st Raisin Extra Sour", "2nd Dark Chocolate Pie", "3rd Rainbow Twisted"]} />
      </Grid.Column>
      <Grid.Column width={7}>
        <TimeSerie />
        <BarChart
          text="Yearly Profit"
          chartTitle="The last 5 year profit (thousand dollars)"
        />
      </Grid.Column>

      <Grid.Column width={5}>
        <DoughnutChart />
        <BarChart
          horizontal
          text="Customer satisfaction"
          chartTitle={`In the first 6 months of ${new Date().getUTCFullYear()}`}
        />
        <PolarChart
          text="Customer by nationality"
          chartTitle={`Quantity of customer nationality`}
        />
      </Grid.Column>
    </Grid.Row>

{/* Second Row */}
    <Grid.Row>
      <Grid.Column width={2}>
        <DoughnutChart />
      </Grid.Column>
      <Grid.Column>
        <Image src="https://react.semantic-ui.com/images/wireframe/paragraph.png" />
      </Grid.Column>
    </Grid.Row>
  </Grid>
);

export default Section;
